colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES PA DPAL LDAN DMAG ZOR RGYAL MO LA BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL BSAM 'PHEL YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI STOBS KYIS 'KHOR LOS BSGYUR BA CHING GIS RGYAL PO'I GDUNG BRGYUD DU 'KHRUNGS PA DAD PA DANG 'BYOR BA @008B PHUN SUM TSOGS PA 'JAM DBYANGS RDO RJE WANG GI SRAS PO DANG STOBS DANG LDAN PA TSE RING RDO RJES 'DI LTA BU BSDUS PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ,SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA SUM MA TI MA nI PRADZNYAS BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I GU SHR'I CHOS RJE KUN DGA' RIN CHEN NO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG, 'GRO BA KUN GYI BYANG CHUB SGRUB PA'I BAR CHAD ZHI ZHING RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS SA LA GO 'PHANG MYUR DU THOB PAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
